Description:
Detects suspicious sysprep process start with AppData folder as target (as used by Trojan Syndicasec in Thrip report by Symantec)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Sysprep on AppData Folder
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\sysprep.exe' and command like '%\appdata\%'
